ingestion/config.py.description: Implemented lazy token validation pattern using _LazyToken class. Token is validated on first access (not import), raising IngestTokenError with helpful instructions if missing or too short (< 16 chars). Backward compatible with existing f-string usage like f'Bearer {INGEST_TOKEN}'.

setup-scraper.sh.description: Script now requires user-provided token via command line arg or INGEST_TOKEN env var. Validates minimum 16 chars. Provides token generation guidance using openssl, /dev/urandom, or Python secrets module. Redacts token from output summary.
